recipesJson.name: A Million Bucks (A Stag Night Remix)
recipesJson.author: CatWillMew
recipesJson.description: I'm a big fan of Stag Night, but the torrone is not one of my favorite flavors.  So I wanted to keep the nuts, tobacco, and booze notes while taking it a little sweeter (but not too sweet).  I think it's a pretty good success.

pageContext.name: A Million Bucks (A Stag Night Remix)
